species.name: Human
species.decription: Humans dominate the Core Worlds and can be found in virtually every corner of the galaxy. They are the ancestors of early spacefaring pioneers, conquerors, traders, travelers and refugees. Humans have always been people on the move. As a result, they can be found on almost every inhabitable planet. As a species, Humans as physically, culturally, and politcally diverse. Hardy or fine, light-skinned or dark, Humans remain one the most dominant species throughtout all eras of play.
species.personality: Human personality runs the gamut of possiblities, though member of this species tend to be highly adaptable, tenacious, and willing to keep striving no matter the odds. They are flexible and ambitious, diverse in their tastes, morals, customs, and habits.
species.appearance: Hmans average about 1.8 meters tall. Skin shades run from nearly black to very pale., hair from black to blond. Men are usually taller and heavier than the women. Humans achieve maturity about the age of 15 and rarely live beyond 100.
species.homeworld: Various, including Coruscant, Corulag, Naboo, Tatooine, and Alderaan.
species.languages: Humans spean and read Basic. They typically learn other languages, including obscure ones.
species.background: Humans aren't afraid to try anything, and Human adventurers are the most audacious, daring, and ambitious species. A Human can earn glory by amassing power, wealth, and fame. More than another species, Humans champion cause rather than territories or groups.

skills.name: Appraise
skills.description: Use this skill to estimate the value of an object, from an old blaster to an Alderaanian heirloom.
skills.retry: Not on same object, regardless of success.

feats.name: Acrobatic
feats.benefit: You gain a +2 apitude bonus on all Jump checks and Tumble checks. Remember, the Tumble skill cannot be used untrained.

feats.name: Advanced Martial Arts
feats.description: You are a master of unarmed combat due to your advanced training.
feats.benefit: A Medium-sized character deals 3d4 damage with an unarmed strike. Strength modifiers apply. Also, you threaten a critical hit on a natural 18, 19, or 20 when making an unarmed strike. Small-sized characters deals 3d3 damage and Large-sized characters deal 3d6 damage.
